text: The Rt. Hon. Perry Gladstone Christie, PC, MP (born 21 August 1943), is a Bahamian politician. He has been the Prime Minister of the Bahamas from May 2012 to May 2017. He was also Prime Minister from 2002 to 2007. He is also a former athlete. He was the leader of the PLP ==References== Category:1943 births Category:Living people Category:Prime ministers of the Bahamas Category:Alumni of the University of Birmingham
title: Perry Christie
